message.content:
cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.CR

Reasoning: The paper deals with constructions of perfect hash families, cover-free families, and separating hash functions, which are all related to data structures and combinatorics. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT), as well as complexity theory (cs.CC) and cryptography (cs.CR) due to the use of hash functions. Finally, the paper may also be relevant to discrete mathematics (cs.DM) due to the combinatorial nature of the problems being addressed.
